mapper.insert: insert into friend(f_recv_u_no, f_send_u_no) values ( (select uNo from user where uEmail = #{uEmail}) , #{uNo})
mapper.select: select * from user inner join friend on user.u_no = friend.f_recv_u_no where friend.f_send_u_no = #{uNo}
select u_name, u_email from user where u_email like concat('%',#{uEmail},'%')
